## Validate.isValidContextQualifierToken() function

Determines whether a string is a valid [context qualifier token](./ts-res.contextqualifiertoken.md)<!-- -->. A context qualifier token has the format: `<qualifierName>=<value>` or `<value>` Context qualifier tokens allow broader character set including commas for comma-separated values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isValidContextQualifierToken(token: string): token is ContextQualifierToken;
```

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

token


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

the string to validate


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

token is [ContextQualifierToken](./ts-res.contextqualifiertoken.md)

`true` if the string is a valid context qualifier token, `false` otherwise.
